Posts.Content: Jun 13, 2016 11:48AM Jaci45 wrote: Please add me to the list as well. I am new to this site but not new to this disease. I was diagnosed in Feb. 2014 with Stage 4 MBC after being in "remission" for almost 5 years. I have been fighting ever since. I have 2 Clinical Trials, 2 Gamma Knifes and 1 Hormone Therapy treatment under my belt. This week I get my third Gamma Knife and start another Chemo. So happy I found this site! :)
Posts.Title: How Many Are We? DivineMrsM kt1966
